bill.summary:
Foreign Entities Reform Act of 2019
This bill requires broadcast, cable, and satellite companies to publicly disclose the source of content from foreign agents that is distributed to American consumers.
In addition, such companies must report all requests for broadcast, cablecast, or origination time made by or on behalf of foreign agents.
